body:
* Intel says it will ship silicon for Neural Network Processing, the Intel Nervana Neural Network Processor, before the end of 2017- statement

* Intel says it is collaborating with Facebook to share Facebook's technical insights to bring new generation of AI hardware to market- statement Source text: intel.ly/2ihapKC Further company coverage:
header: BRIEF-Intel says to ship Intel Nervana Neural Network Processor before 2017-end
